title: When going to support on top right.....
body: Say u got help my support on top right, if they reply how do u reply back- by replying back in the email or creating a new support ticket because I haven't got a reply for a long time.

replies.body:
I've replied by replying to the email.
If it has been too long (2 weeks+), submit a new ticket and include the ID number from the current one.
